roleset.name: fly beyond or faster than another

role.descr: first flier who is winning, flying faster/further
other flier who is being outflown

example.name: All args
example.text: ...[Sukhoi SU-27 fighter-bombers], which-1 *-1 can outfly the MiG-29s.

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in wsj-nw. Framed by Claire.
